strapiPost.title: Keep The Good Times Rolling With Travel & Tap
strapiPost.content:
Add an unforgettable element to your next event with Travel & Tap, the area's only 2-in-1 Mobile Bar and Photo Booth on wheels. Check it out for yourself today at First Friday in Bentonville!

  • Roll on up: Whether you're hosting a summer soir√©e, wedding, corporate event, grand opening, or birthday, Travel & Tap will keep your guests' glasses full with mocktails, beer, custom cocktails, and more on tap, and the built-in photo booth gives your guests the perfect party favor.
  • They take requests: From the drinks on tap to the photo booth props and signage, everything about Travel & Tap is customizable, so you can create the perfect experience to match your party's theme and aesthetic.

Find Travel & Tap on Instagram and book them for your next event HERE.
